titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to treat as 5-year property for depreciation purposes facilities which use anthracite culm fuel.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/1/1987--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to treat facilities that use anthracite culm fuel as five-year property for purposes of the accelerated cost recovery system used to determine the income tax depreciation deduction.
